entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 8.

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Local blowing snow. Wind north 50 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 9. Wind chill near minus 20. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 09 March 2023
